mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_id as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_liuyan_text as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_uuid_number as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingUuidNumber ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_name as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingName ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.status_types as statusTypes ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_photo as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingPhoto ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_time as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingTime ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_dizhi as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingDizhi ,xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_content as xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_liuyan a left JOIN xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling ON a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_id = xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_id = #{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_id IS NOT NULL
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingUuidNumber},'%')
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingName},'%')
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.status_types = #{params.statusTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingTimeEnd})
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingDizhi},'%')
and xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaoling_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyuanshiwuzhaolingContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
